info.name: Appointment360 API
info.description: Postman collection for the Appointment360 FastAPI backend. Includes v1 endpoints (Contacts, Imports) and v2 endpoints (Authentication, Users, AI Chat). All endpoints require Bearer token authentication. Sample parameters align with docs/apis.md, docs/api/user.md, and docs/api/ai_chat.md.

item.name: System

item.name: Authentication

header.description: Expected response content type.
Request body content type. Required for POST/PUT requests with JSON bodies.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

request.description:
Register a new user account and receive access tokens. A user profile is automatically created upon registration.

**Field Requirements:**
- name (string, required): User's full name (max 255 characters)
- email (string, required): Valid email address (must be unique)
- password (string, required): Password (min 8 characters, max 72 characters due to bcrypt limitation)

**Response Codes:**
- 201 Created: Registration successful
- 400 Bad Request: Invalid request data, email already exists, or password validation failed

header.description: Expected response content type.
Request body content type. Required for POST/PUT requests with JSON bodies.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

request.description:
Authenticate a user and receive access tokens. Updates the user's last_sign_in_at timestamp upon successful login.

**Field Requirements:**
- email (string, required): User's email address (must be valid email format)
- password (string, required): User's password

**Response Codes:**
- 200 OK: Login successful
- 400 Bad Request: Invalid credentials, missing fields, or account disabled

header.description: Expected response content type.
JWT Bearer token for authentication. Obtained from login or register endpoints.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

request.description: Get the current authenticated user's session information. Useful for checking token validity.

header.description: Expected response content type.
Request body content type. Required for POST/PUT requests with JSON bodies.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

request.description:
Refresh an expired access token using a refresh token. Returns new access and refresh tokens (token rotation).

**Request Body:**
- refresh_token (string, required): Valid refresh token

**Response Codes:**
- 200 OK: Token refresh successful
- 400 Bad Request: Invalid or expired refresh token

header.description: Expected response content type.
Request body content type. Required for POST/PUT requests with JSON bodies.
JWT Bearer token for authentication. Obtained from login or register endpoints.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

request.description:
Logout the current user and invalidate refresh token. Logout succeeds even if refresh token is not provided.

**Request Body:**
- refresh_token (string, optional): Refresh token to blacklist. If not provided, logout still succeeds.

**Response Codes:**
- 200 OK: Logout successful

item.description: User authentication endpoints for registration, login, logout, token refresh, and session management.

item.name: Users

header.description: Expected response content type.
JWT Bearer token for authentication. Obtained from login or register endpoints.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

request.description: Get the profile information for the currently authenticated user. If a profile doesn't exist, it will be automatically created with default values.

header.description: Expected response content type.
Request body content type. Required for POST/PUT requests with JSON bodies.
JWT Bearer token for authentication. Obtained from login or register endpoints.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

request.description:
Update the profile information for the currently authenticated user. All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated (partial update).

**Optional Fields:**
- name (string, optional, max 255 chars): User's full name
- job_title (string, optional, max 255 chars): User's job title
- bio (string, optional): User's biography (text field)
- timezone (string, optional, max 100 chars): User's timezone (e.g., "America/New_York")
- avatar_url (string, optional): URL to user's avatar image
- notifications (object, optional): User notification preferences (merged with existing preferences)
  - weeklyReports (boolean, optional): Enable/disable weekly reports
  - newLeadAlerts (boolean, optional): Enable/disable new lead alerts
- role (string, optional, max 50 chars): User's role

**Response Codes:**
- 200 OK: Profile updated successfully
- 400 Bad Request: Invalid data provided
- 401 Unauthorized: Authentication required

header.description: Expected response content type.
JWT Bearer token for authentication. Obtained from login or register endpoints.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

formdata.description: Image file (JPEG, PNG, GIF, or WebP, max 5MB)

request.description:
Upload an avatar image file for the currently authenticated user.

**File Requirements:**
- File Types: JPEG, PNG, GIF, or WebP
- Maximum Size: 5MB
- Validation: Both file extension and file content (magic bytes) are validated

**Request:**
- Content-Type: multipart/form-data (automatically set by Postman)
- Body: Form-data with key "avatar" and type "file"

**Response Codes:**
- 200 OK: Avatar uploaded successfully
- 400 Bad Request: Invalid file type or size
- 401 Unauthorized: Authentication required
- 500 Internal Server Error: Error saving file

header.description: Expected response content type.
JWT Bearer token for authentication. Obtained from login or register endpoints.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

request.description:
Promote the currently authenticated user to admin role.

**Request:**
- No request body required
- Uses the authenticated user from the Bearer token

**Response Codes:**
- 200 OK: User promoted to admin successfully
- 401 Unauthorized: Authentication required
- 400 Bad Request: User account is disabled
- 404 Not Found: User not found
- 500 Internal Server Error: Failed to promote user to admin

**Notes:**
- This endpoint allows authenticated users to change their role to "Admin"
- The operation is logged for audit purposes
- If a profile doesn't exist, it will be automatically created with default values before promotion

item.description: User profile management endpoints for retrieving, updating profiles, uploading avatars, and promoting users to admin.

item.name: AI Chat

header.description: Expected response content type.
JWT Bearer token for authentication. Obtained from login or register endpoints.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

query.description: Number of results per page (default: 25, max: 100)
Order by field. Prepend '-' for descending. Valid: created_at, updated_at, -created_at, -updated_at (default: -created_at)

request.description:
Get a list of all AI chat conversations for the current user with pagination.

**Query Parameters:**
- limit (integer, optional): Number of results per page (default: 25, max: 100)
- offset (integer, optional): Offset for pagination (default: 0)
- ordering (string, optional): Order by field. Prepend '-' for descending. Valid fields: created_at, updated_at, -created_at, -updated_at (default: -created_at)

**Response Codes:**
- 200 OK: Chat history retrieved successfully
- 401 Unauthorized: Authentication required

header.description: Expected response content type.
Request body content type. Required for POST/PUT requests with JSON bodies.
JWT Bearer token for authentication. Obtained from login or register endpoints.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

request.description:
Create a new AI chat conversation.

**Field Requirements:**
- title (string, optional): Chat title (max 255 characters, default: empty string)
- messages (array, optional): List of messages (default: empty list)

**Message Format:**
Each message must be an object with:
- sender (string, required): Must be either "user" or "ai"
- text (string, required): Message text content
- contacts (array, optional): Array of contact objects when AI returns search results

**Response Codes:**
- 201 Created: Chat created successfully
- 400 Bad Request: Invalid request data
- 401 Unauthorized: Authentication required

header.description: Expected response content type.
JWT Bearer token for authentication. Obtained from login or register endpoints.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

request.description:
Get detailed information about a specific AI chat conversation, including all messages.

**Path Parameters:**
- id (string, UUID): Chat ID

**Response Codes:**
- 200 OK: Chat retrieved successfully
- 401 Unauthorized: Authentication required
- 403 Forbidden: User does not own this chat
- 404 Not Found: Chat not found

header.description: Expected response content type.
Request body content type. Required for POST/PUT requests with JSON bodies.
JWT Bearer token for authentication. Obtained from login or register endpoints.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

request.description:
Update an existing AI chat conversation (typically to add new messages or update the title). All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated.

**Path Parameters:**
- id (string, UUID): Chat ID

**Field Requirements:**
All fields are optional:
- title (string, optional): Chat title (max 255 characters)
- messages (array, optional): Complete list of messages (replaces existing messages)

**Message Format:**
Each message must be an object with:
- sender (string, required): Must be either "user" or "ai"
- text (string, required): Message text content
- contacts (array, optional): Array of contact objects when AI returns search results

**Response Codes:**
- 200 OK: Chat updated successfully
- 400 Bad Request: Invalid request data
- 401 Unauthorized: Authentication required
- 403 Forbidden: User does not own this chat
- 404 Not Found: Chat not found

header.description: Expected response content type.
JWT Bearer token for authentication. Obtained from login or register endpoints.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

request.description:
Delete an AI chat conversation.

**Path Parameters:**
- id (string, UUID): Chat ID

**Response Codes:**
- 204 No Content: Chat deleted successfully
- 401 Unauthorized: Authentication required
- 403 Forbidden: User does not own this chat
- 404 Not Found: Chat not found

**Notes:**
- Only the chat owner can delete their chats
- Deletion is permanent and cannot be undone
- The response has no body (204 No Content)

item.description: AI chat conversation endpoints for listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting chat conversations. All endpoints require JWT authentication and verify ownership before allowing access.

item.name: Contacts

header.description: Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

query.description: View mode: 'simple' returns ContactSimpleItem (id, uuid, name, title, location, company_name, person_linkedin_url, company_domain). Omit for full ContactListItem.
Zero-based offset into the result set (>=0).
Opaque cursor token for pagination (base64 encoding of offset).
Optional 1-indexed page number (>=1). Converts to offset when provided.
Explicit page size override (>=1, bounded by MAX_PAGE_SIZE).
Return distinct contacts based on primary key (boolean).
Sort results by field. Prepend '-' for descending. Valid fields: created_at, updated_at, first_name, last_name, email, company name, etc.
General-purpose search term applied across contact and company text columns (case-insensitive).
Exclude contacts whose title matches any provided value (case-insensitive). Accepts comma-separated values or repeated parameters.
Exclude contacts whose seniority matches any provided value (case-insensitive). Accepts comma-separated values or repeated parameters.
Alias for departments filter. Substring match against Contact.departments array (comma-delimited text).
Substring match against Contact.departments array (stored as comma-delimited text).
Exclude contacts whose departments include any provided value (case-insensitive). Accepts comma-separated values or repeated parameters.
Alias for company filter. Case-insensitive substring match against Company.name.

query.value: McLean Virginia United States,Portsmouth New Hampshire United States
query.description: Company text-search filter. Matches Company.text_search covering address, city, state, and country.

query.value: McLean Virginia United States,Portsmouth New Hampshire United States
query.description: Alias for company_location. Company text-search column covering address fields.

query.value: McLean Virginia United States,Portsmouth New Hampshire United States
query.description: Exclude contacts whose company text_search matches any provided value (case-insensitive). Accepts comma-separated values or repeated parameters.
Contact text-search filter. Matches Contact.text_search covering person-level location metadata.
Alias for contact_location. Contact text-search column covering person-level location metadata.
Exclude contacts whose contact text_search matches any provided value (case-insensitive). Accepts comma-separated values or repeated parameters.
Alias for employees_count. Exact match against Company.employees_count (integer, >=0).
Exact match against Company.annual_revenue stored as integer dollars (>=0).
Lower-bound filter applied to Company.annual_revenue in integer dollars (>=0).
Upper-bound filter applied to Company.annual_revenue in integer dollars (>=0).
Substring match within Company.technologies array (stored as text array).
Exclude contacts whose company technologies include any provided value (case-insensitive). Accepts comma-separated values or repeated parameters.
Substring match within Company.keywords array (stored as text array).
Exclude contacts whose company keywords include any provided value (case-insensitive). Accepts comma-separated values or repeated parameters.
Substring match within Company.industries array (stored as text array). Alias: industry.
Exclude contacts whose company industries include any provided value (case-insensitive). Accepts comma-separated values or repeated parameters.
Exclude contacts whose company UUID matches any provided value. Accepts comma-separated values or repeated parameters.
Alias for corporate_phone. Substring match against CompanyMetadata.phone_number.
Substring match against ContactMetadata.facebook_url or CompanyMetadata.facebook_url.
Substring match against ContactMetadata.twitter_url or CompanyMetadata.twitter_url.
Filter contacts created after the provided ISO 8601 timestamp (inclusive). Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.
Filter contacts created before the provided ISO 8601 timestamp (inclusive). Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.
Filter contacts updated after the provided ISO 8601 timestamp (inclusive). Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.
Filter contacts updated before the provided ISO 8601 timestamp (inclusive). Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

request.description: Retrieve a paginated set of contacts using every supported filter parameter.

header.description: Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

query.description: Request distinct contacts based on primary key (boolean).
General-purpose search term applied across contact and company text columns (case-insensitive).
Filter contacts created after ISO 8601 timestamp (inclusive).
Filter contacts created before ISO 8601 timestamp (inclusive).

request.description: Return the total number of contacts that satisfy the provided filters. Supports all ContactFilterParams. Use distinct=true to count unique contacts.

header.description: Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

request.description: Fetch details for a single contact by primary key.

header.description: Required header for write operations. Must match the configured CONTACTS_WRITE_KEY value. Used to authorize contact creation, updates, and deletions.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

body.raw:
{
  "uuid": "f4b8c3f5-1111-4f9b-aaaa-123456789abc",
  "first_name": "Patrick",
  "last_name": "McGarry",
  "company_id": "398cce44-233d-5f7c-aea1-e4a6a79df10c",
  "email": "pat.mcgarry@banduracyber.com",
  "title": "Chief Technology Officer",
  "departments": [
    "C-Suite",
    "Engineering & Technical"
  ],
  "mobile_phone": "+1 937-555-0132",
  "email_status": "Verified",
  "text_search": "Fulton Maryland United States",
  "seniority": "C suite"
}

request.description:
Create a new contact record using the ContactCreate schema. All body fields are optional:
- uuid (string, optional): Contact UUID. If not provided, one will be generated.
- first_name (string, optional): Contact's first name.
- last_name (string, optional): Contact's last name.
- company_id (string, optional): UUID of the related company.
- email (string, optional): Contact's email address.
- title (string, optional): Contact's job title.
- departments (array[string], optional): List of department names.
- mobile_phone (string, optional): Contact's mobile phone number.
- email_status (string, optional): Email verification status.
- text_search (string, optional): Free-form search text, e.g., location information.
- seniority (string, optional): Contact's seniority level.

Requires admin authentication and X-Contacts-Write-Key header.

item.name: Imports

header.description: Expected response content type.
JWT Bearer token for authentication. Obtained from login or register endpoints.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

request.description: Provides instructions for uploading a contacts CSV file.

header.description: Expected response content type.
JWT Bearer token for authentication. Obtained from login or register endpoints.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

formdata.description: Upload the sample CSV located under data/data/apollo_sample_5000_cleaned.csv.

request.description:
Start a background contacts import using a CSV file.

**File Requirements:**
- Format: CSV (Comma-Separated Values)
- File must not be empty
- File name is required

**Request:**
- Content-Type: multipart/form-data (automatically set by Postman)
- Body: Form-data with key "file" and type "file"
- Requires admin authentication

**Response Codes:**
- 202 Accepted: Import job created and queued
- 400 Bad Request: Empty file or missing filename
- 401 Unauthorized: Authentication required
- 403 Forbidden: Admin access required
- 422 Unprocessable Entity: File name is required
- 500 Internal Server Error: Failed to store file or create job

header.description: Expected response content type.
JWT Bearer token for authentication. Obtained from login or register endpoints.
Optional: Origin header for CORS testing. Enable this header to verify CORS response headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin, etc.). Disabled by default since Postman doesn't enforce CORS.

query.description: Toggle inclusion of row-level error details in the response. When false (default), returns ImportJobDetail. When true, returns ImportJobWithErrors containing an errors array with row-level import errors.

request.description:
Fetch the status of a queued import job without embedded errors.

**Query Parameters:**
- include_errors (boolean, optional, default: false): When false, returns ImportJobDetail. When true, returns ImportJobWithErrors with embedded error payloads.

**Response Codes:**
- 200 OK: Job details retrieved
- 401 Unauthorized: Authentication required
- 404 Not Found: Import job not found

header.description: Expected response content type.
JWT Bearer token for authentication. Obtained from login or register endpoints.

query.description: Toggle inclusion of row-level error details in the response. When true, returns ImportJobWithErrors containing an errors array with row-level import errors. When false (default), returns ImportJobDetail.

request.description:
Fetch the status of a queued import job with embedded error payloads.

**Query Parameters:**
- include_errors (boolean, optional, default: false): When true, returns ImportJobWithErrors with embedded error payloads. When false, returns ImportJobDetail.

**Response Codes:**
- 200 OK: Job details with errors retrieved
- 401 Unauthorized: Authentication required
- 404 Not Found: Import job not found

header.description: Expected response content type.
JWT Bearer token for authentication. Obtained from login or register endpoints.

request.description: Retrieve recorded row-level import errors for the specified job.

item.description: Endpoints supporting the contacts CSV import workflow.

Example contact identifier for detail routes.
Placeholder job identifier for import status checks.
Local CSV file path used for import requests. Update this to point to your CSV file location. File must be in CSV format and not empty.
